title: Wrangell - St Elias National Park & Preserve: Subsistence Hunting
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Management     Subsistence     Subsistence Hunting                Subsistence Hunting      Both federal subsistence and State of Alaska sport hunting are permitted in Wrangell-St. Elias National Preserve. State sport harvests are regulated by the Alaska Board of Game while federal subsistence harvests are regulated by the Federal Subsistence Board.Subsistence Hunting is permitted in both the Park and Preserve.  Sport Hunting is permitted in the Preserve ONLY.  To be eligible to hunt in the park or preserve under federal subsitence regulations, you must be considered a local, rural resident. Are YOU eligible to subsistence hunt?Federal subsistence hunting permits are available at park visitor centers.
